item.title: Blog Theme/博客主题
item.description: 本博客的主题基于默认主题hugo-lithium 进行了一些微小的改动。 修改菜单栏，添加目录标签 直接在config.toml上修改， [[menu.main]] name = "About" url = "/about/" weight = "2" [[menu.main]] name = "Categories" url = "/Categories/" weight = "3" [[menu.main]] name = "Tags" url = "/Tags/" weight = "4" [[menu.main]] name = "GitHub" url = "https://github.com/huanghaicheng1024" weight = "5" weight表示顺序。 更换图标 下载喜欢的图标的两个文件(.ico,.png),分别为博客左上角图片与浏览器标签页上面的图标，分别放在主题文件夹/static/images,/static，修改config.toml上favicon与[params.logo]的值。 添加自定义CSS config.toml添加代码 # Custom CSS. Put here your custom CSS files. They are loaded after the theme CSS; # they have to be referred from static root.

item.title: Test
item.description: 这是一篇测试博客。 数学符号 \[ \alpha = \sum_{i=1}^n\mu_i \] R代码测试 summary(iris) ## Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width ## Min. :4.300 Min. :2.000 Min. :1.000 Min. :0.100 ## 1st Qu.:5.100 1st Qu.:2.800 1st Qu.:1.600 1st Qu.:0.300 ## Median :5.800 Median :3.000 Median :4.350 Median :1.300 ## Mean :5.843 Mean :3.057 Mean :3.758 Mean :1.199 ## 3rd Qu.:6.400 3rd Qu.:3.300 3rd Qu.:5.100 3rd Qu.:1.800 ## Max. :7.900 Max. :4.400 Max. :6.900 Max. :2.500 ## Species ## setosa :50 ## versicolor:50 ## virginica :50 ## ## ##

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie. 现在这里是我学习R的博客，我会在这里不定期更新R的学习过程，以及使用R进行实战的过程。 关于我？一条很菜却还有一点点理想的咸鱼，喜欢胡思乱想却懒于记录。

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
